item.title: Alien Has Officially Fixed Prometheus, Now It’s Time For This Other Part Of The Franchise To Be Rescued
item.description: Now that Alien: Romulus has turned Prometheus into a pivotal part of the Alien franchise, it is time to save the other infamous misstep in the series.

item.title: Was Mia Responsible For All The Chaos In Pulp Fiction? 1 Theory Completely Changes Vincent & Marsellus' Stories
item.description: A wild Pulp Fiction theory suggests Mia Wallace is the one responsible for the chaos in Vincent and Marsellus' stories, but there's a catch.

item.title: Why Edward Cullen’s Death Plan In Twilight: New Moon Never Made Sense
item.description: In The Twilight Saga: New Moon, Edward makes a wild decision and tries to get himself killed, but this plan doesn't make sense for various reasons.
